backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with admin auth, user profiles, vehicles, promotions, blogs, media assets, and visitor stats, seeding super admin and mixing in storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, and admin modules for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entry point with root container and module script.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation explaining how to redeploy the frontend canister and validate all routes and CMS features post-deployment.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by validating session state, with a temporary emergency bypass mode for debugging.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Defines the admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage, migration, cookies, and provides helpers like bypass session creation.
Enables a debug-only authentication bypass and defines default bypass user config.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Shows an access-denied screen with a button to return to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Reusable page header component displaying a title, optional subtitle, and optional action UI.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing blog posts, including image selection and rich fields.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Confirmation dialog for destructive actions with customizable title and description.
Generic CRUD table supporting search, custom columns, edit/delete actions, and published status display.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays and filters media assets with search and delete functionality, handling errors and confirmations.
Dialog for browsing, searching, and selecting media assets, with error handling and selection state.
Button component that uploads selected media files by converting them to data URLs and sending them to the backend.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Provides a dialog form to create or edit a promotion with fields for text, dates, image selection, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Implements a dialog form for adding or editing customer testimonials, including text fields, rating input, image selection, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Renders a multi-tab dialog for creating or editing vehicles with fields for specs, variants, media, commercial features, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Renders checkboxes for toggling commercial vehicle feature flags and updates the parent on changes.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Provides form inputs for technical specs and allows adding or removing custom additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Enables creating, editing, and deleting vehicle variants with price and feature lists, including inline editing mode.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating CMS admin data such as media assets, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Placeholder file kept for compatibility; exports nothing.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state, validation, login flow, and emergency bypass logic using actor authentication.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug page for manually testing admin login using form inputs and displaying authentication results.
Renders the admin login form, handles authentication flow, redirects, and supports an emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Loads and edits the logged-in admin’s profile with a simple form and save operation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Displays, searches, creates, edits, and deletes blog posts using CRUD dialogs and table view.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Shows high-level statistics for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and simulations.
Manages contact and credit simulation leads with search, tab switching, and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Loads media assets, shows auth errors, and renders upload and management tools for media files.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Provides CRUD management for promotions with search, table display, and form dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting testimonials with form and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page that filters, displays, and manages passenger or commercial vehicles with CRUD operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Admin dashboard for viewing and updating visitor statistics with editable form and stat cards.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines admin-specific CSS variables and styles for layout, tables, cards, buttons, and theme elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all public and admin routes using TanStack Router with shared layouts, guards, and page components.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: User contact form that validates inputs, submits contact data, and resets on success with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests, validating required fields and sending data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: A global React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload option when an unhandled error occurs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying dealer info, social links, and attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Page layout with navbar, optional hero, footer, tracking hook, and bottom CTA components.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom action bar offering call, WhatsApp, credit form, and navigation menu access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Slide-up sheet showing main navigation links for mobile use.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with logo, links, WhatsApp button, and mobile slide‑in menu.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Reusable section title component with an icon and styled heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Call‑to‑action section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with welcoming text and branding.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Displays vehicle info, pricing, features, and links to details with consultation option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, reinitializing dependents when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, blog posts, interactions, and contacts using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors via sessionStorage and increments visitor and page view counters.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for themes, colors, and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with metadata updates and fallback UI for loading or missing posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with preview cards and links to detailed pages, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed information for a commercial vehicle with like/share actions and rich UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles, filtering them into light, medium, and tractor head categories and displaying them with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form along with contact details, map embed, and sales consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows featured vehicles, a CTA banner, about section, search for vehicles, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a passenger vehicle with variants, pricing, interactions (like/share), and media handling.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Shows current promotions with images, descriptions, validity dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, avatars, and basic info.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public/admin routes for smoke testing and utilities to generate checklists and validate router configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query and hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, constraints, known issues, and current state metadata for the automotive website.
